lyrics:
24 contributorssmash into you lyricsproduced by thedream and tricky stewart

verse 1
head down
as i watch my feet take turns hitting the ground
eyes shut
i find myself in love racing the earth

prechorus
and im soaked in your love
and love was right in my path in my grasp
and me and you belong

chorus
i wanna run run
and smash into you
i wanna run run
and smash into you

verse 2
ears closed
what i hear no one else has to know
cause i know
that what we have is worth first place in gold

prechorus
and im soaked in your love ah
and love is right in my path in my grasp
and me and you belong oh
you might also likechorus
i wanna run run
smash into you
i wanna run run
smash into you smash into you

break
oh oh
oh oh

bridge
head head down down
as i watch my feet take turns hitting the ground
eyes shut
im in love and im racing the earth

prechorus
and im soaked in your love your love
and love is right in my path in my grasp
and me and you belong

chorus

smash into you
im willin to run i wanna run run
smash into you

ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
